name: JigsawMania
description: JigsawMania brings classic jigsaw puzzle fun to your computer! Access over 6,000 puzzle images from WallpaperFusion, choose from multiple difficulty levels, save images for offline use, and much more.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 Processor: 2 GHZ Intel or AMD Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: Any graphics card Storage: 100 MB available space
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 10 Processor: 2 GHZ Intel or AMD Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: Any graphics card Storage: 200 MB available space
